text: Sir Julius Chan (29 August 1939 â€“ 30 January 2025) was a Papua New Guinean politician. He was the Prime Minister of Papua New Guinea from 1980 to 1982 and from 1994 to 1997. He was Member of Parliament for New Ireland Province from 2007 until his death. He was also the Governor of New Ireland Province from 2007 until his death in 2025."PM O'Neill will not resign until Court interprets the rules on VoNC", Papua New Guinea Today, 27 May 2019 Chan died on 30 January 2025 in New Ireland Province, Papua New Guinea at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Papua New Guinea
title: Julius Chan
